CustomField.description: WHERE clause filter condition. Use :FieldName for bind variables from the main record (e.g., AccountId = :AccountId). Static values are also supported (e.g., Status = 'Open').
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Filter condition using bind variables like :AccountId or :Id (e.g., "AccountId = :AccountId AND Status = 'Open'")
CustomField.label: Filter Condition
